Year: SOURCE: Social Security Administration, Master Beneficiary Record. Data for 1945–1984 are based on various sampling rates. Data for 1985–2005 are based on a 10 percent sample. All other years are 100 percent data.
Retired-worker families: NOTES: Totals do not necessarily equal the sum of rounded components.
Disabled-worker families: a. Wife's entitlement based on age.
Worker only: b. Wife's entitlement based on care of children.
